comments: Professor Rezendes is a great professor. I would definitely take her again. She is an easy grader. You have to read a lot and have many homework assignments but they are easy.

comments: Awful class and awful class setup. The entire semester is based off reading long boring texts and there is an assignment due each class. The class is far too demanding for what it is.

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)
stu_tags: GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA
comments: I found this class to be very draining, but the material we touched upon was actually very useful in teaching about issues that I was worried about when starting college. She is a great professor that gets everything returned in a timely manner and easily connects with her students.

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)
comments: I utterly despise this course, it is needlessly demanding, teaches absolutely nothing useful, and requires grueling hours of study and writing, and it is mandatory for all students regardless of academic focus or age. The only thing that makes this course even remotely bearable is Professor Rezendes. She is helpful, kind and patient.

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Very helpful. Best professor I have had at BSU. Tedious work at times, but it is easy and basic. 4 Papers, 2-3 weeks to complete each. Recommend her!

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)
comments: She is an awesome professor! Really gets students involved in class discussions and is super helpful. She is pretty laid back and will generally accept late work, as long as she thinks you put in the effort. Easy homework assignments, a few essays, no midterm, and a take home final. She really taught me a lot about english!

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)
comments: She is a very nice teacher, and cancels class frequently which is a plus. Very easy class to pass.

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)
comments: She is a fair grader. Its 3 Papers and a final paper thats more artistic than anything. Really just show up and have an idea what the reading is and an opinion and you can pass this class.

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Awesome professor, you can tell how much she cares about her students just from the way she presents herself in the classroom. Only assignments you\'ll ever do are free writing prompts and 4 essays, plus a final reflection. Definitely take her if you want to actually enjoy going to an 8am and get an A.

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Very easy professor! She is always there to help you with any assignment. Doesn\'t make you participate in class, but she certainly encourages you to. No exams, just short writing prompts at the beginning of each class and four papers the whole semester. Take her if you actually want an A/want to learn!

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)
comments: She is very nice and helpful. Overall the class is good but she does require class participation and lectures frequently. Overall she\'s okay.

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Really nice lady who\'s enthusiastic without going over the top and shoving it down your throat. She\'s perfectly fine with you disliking her class. Always willing to help and is easy if you do the work. Very open to opinions. Very tranquil person.

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Had her for a science fiction seminar. She encourages participation, but she\'s a great teacher!

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)
comments: She\'s a great teacher! Love her, i\'m trying so hard to get in to her writing 2 class,lol. She\'s so cool

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Amazing teacher, makes me want to attend class. I want to take her class for Writing 2, but her class time doesn\'t fit my schedule. She is very helpful, doesn\'t make it necessary to speak in class, but tries her hardest to get you involved. She grades fairly, just do the work & hand it in when it\'s due and you\'ll have an A. Great person, too.

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Loved her,time went by really fast.Very attentive to her students. Essays are clear and straight forward. Always willing to help if you have any questions and she gives you plenty of time to do the essays. First draft are needed to see if you can improve always glad to give feed back. If you do the work its an easy A just put in the effort.Take her

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)
comments: She\'s a great teacher extremely nice, very easy. Not much work and essays are easy. She allows 3-5 absences and class flies by. I recommend her for writing one.

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)
comments: She was really easy for writing one. Classes weren\'t bad at all and time flew by. We had a lot of time for writing assignments and they weren\'t that long either. No final for the class, very helpful and gave extra credit. She is cool and I\'m Facebook friends with her. Take her for an easy A. (And yes, you do learn from her also. PS she likes cats.)
